script
Class Bloc

java.lang.Object
  script.Bloc
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConditionalBloc, Function
public abstract class Bloc
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This is the base abstract class used in Script. It can represent a bloc of type IF or DO, or a function

Author:
frank
See Also:
Serialized Form

getNextBloc

public Bloc getNextBloc()
This method returns the next bloc in the flow. It never returns a DoBloc if this bloc is contained in the DoBloc loop.

Returns:
the next bloc of this bloc in the flow

isLastBlocOf

public boolean isLastBlocOf(DoBloc doBloc)
This method tells if the current bloc is the last bloc of the parameter do bloc

Parameters:
doBloc - the do bloc to be tested
Returns:
true if this bloc is last bloc of the parameter do bloc

setNextDoBloc

public void setNextDoBloc(DoBloc doBloc)
This method sets one of the two next bloc of this bloc as a do bloc. In other words, this bloc will be the last bloc in the do bloc loop.

Parameters:
doBloc - The do bloc which is the next bloc of this bloc

setNextBloc

public void setNextBloc(Bloc bloc)
This method sets one of the two next bloc of this bloc to the bloc parameter.

Parameters:
bloc - the bloc which is the next bloc of this bloc

addPreviousBloc

public void addPreviousBloc(Bloc bloc,
                            boolean isLastBlocInDoBloc)
This method adds a bloc as previous bloc of this bloc. if the bloc to add is the last bloc of a do bloc loop, second parameter must be set to true, which means that the current bloc is a do bloc.

Parameters:
bloc - the bloc to be added as previous bloc of this bloc
isLastBlocInDoBloc - whether or not the bloc to be added is the last bloc of this bloc. If true, this bloc is a do bloc

removeNextBloc

public void removeNextBloc(Bloc bloc)
This method removes a bloc from one of the two next blocs of this bloc. It also removes this bloc from previous blocs of any of these next blocs. This is very useful for blocs connection deletion.

Parameters:
bloc - the bloc to be removed

removePreviousBloc

public void removePreviousBloc(Bloc bloc)
This method removes a bloc from all the previous blocs of this bloc.

Parameters:
bloc - the bloc to be removed

getCode

public abstract java.lang.String getCode()
Returns the code associated with this bloc. This method is abstract as the generated code depends on the concrete type of the bloc

Returns:
the code

getSizeAndLocation

public org.eclipse.draw2d.geometry.Rectangle getSizeAndLocation()
Helper method that return size and location as a draw2D rectangle

Returns:
the Draw2D rectangle that holds size and location

setSizeAndLocation

public void setSizeAndLocation(org.eclipse.draw2d.geometry.Rectangle newSizeAndLocation)
Helper method that update size and position's bloc

Parameters:
newSizeAndLocation - a draw2D Rectangle that holds size and location

addSizeAndLocationListener

public void addSizeAndLocationListener(SizeAndLocationListener listener)
Add a listener to the list of size and location listener

Parameters:
listener - the listener to be added

removeSizeAndLocationListener

public void removeSizeAndLocationListener(SizeAndLocationListener listener)
Remove a listener to the list of size and location listener

Parameters:
listener - the listener to be removed
